## Project: LINE Bot Webhook on Supabase Edge Functions

### Overview
A LINE Bot backend deployed on Supabase Edge Functions (Deno runtime) to replace unstable Google Apps Script webhook endpoint.

### Features
- LINE Messaging API webhook endpoint
- Track group message counts per user per month
- Store data in Supabase PostgreSQL database
- TypeScript with Deno runtime

### Tech Stack
- Runtime: Deno (Supabase Edge Functions)
- Database: Supabase PostgreSQL
- Language: TypeScript
- API: LINE Messaging API
